description: Indian food is perhaps as diverse as its culture and offers a lot more than curries and gravies.
France boasts of a wide range of cuisines. The cuisines follow authentic traditional cooking practices.
Italian food boasts of classically prepared pizza bases baked with savoury toppings of vegetables, meat, and cheese.
They say, Chinese food is the tastiest in the world. It includes soups, snacks, and meals prepared with rice, noodles, vegetables, meats, seafood, sauces, and seasonings.
Thai food is popular for the aroma it brings with the addition of lemongrass, lemon leaves, galangal, chili, and aromatic herbs.
Mexican line of food is famous for spicy and tangy taste. It includes salads, snacks, one-dish meals, elaborate meals, and desserts.
